PageLayout.title: next-intl example template with App Router

docs.title: Docs
docs.description: Learn more about next-intl in the official docs.

source.title: Source code
source.description: Browse the source code of this example on GitHub.

IndexPage.title: Example template with Next.js App Router
IndexPage.description: This is a basic example demonstrating the use of next-intl and next-theme with Next.js App Router. Try changing the locale in the top right corner and see how the content changes. Also change the theme at the top right and watch the theme change

PathnamesPage.title: Pathnames
PathnamesPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/path in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to Spanish, the URL is localized accordingly (/de/ruta).

Error.title: Something went wrong!
Error.description:
We've unfortunately encountered an error.

You can try to reload the page you were visiting.

NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.description: Please double-check the browser address bar or use the navigation to go to a known page.
